{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WLI-TX4-AG300N |upc=747464118482 |asin=B001QVN2NE |newegg=N82E16833162029 |est_release_date=04/01/2009 |fcc_date=01/19/2009 |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WACR-130N |type=bridge |fcc_id=FDI-09102074-0 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT2880;RT2880F, TNFR125G0, 1250PT; |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320EBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-6G |ram1_num=2 |jtag=probably |serial=yes,, internal,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL,, 4-pin header,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2880;RT2880F, TNFR125G0, 1250PT; |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2850;RT2850L, TC4S518E0, 1250PT; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=IC+ |sw_model=IP175C |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips=3A, 23V, 340KHz Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2307DN;;1; ,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;Richteck;RT9164A;;1; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6671;;2; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3; |stock_os=Linux;2.4.30; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ip=1.1.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=blank |oui=00:24:A5 |oui_eth=00:24:A5 }} {{TagLine|Buffalo AirStation Nfiniti Dual Band Wireless-N Ethernet Converter}} :[http://www.buffalo-technology.com/en/products/networking/adapters-converters/airstationtm-nfinititm-dual-band/archive/wli-tx4-ag300n-airstation-trade-nfiniti-trade-dual-band-wireless-n-ethernet-converter/ Product page] (EN)
